1.name: slimy iron key
text: It looks very old and seems to be made of iron. It has some slime on it.

2.name: rusty sword
attack_text: You attack <name> with your rusty sword.
You swing your rusty sword at <name>.
You stab at <name> with your rusty sword.
on_equip_text: You carry the rusty old sword in it's accompanying scabbard placed on your hip.
text: It looks quite old. It has some slime on it.

3.name: bow
on_equip_text: You carry the old bow and it's accompanying quiver over your shoulder.
text: It looks aged. It has deteriorated in quality due to the passage of time.

4.name: green ring
4.text_identified: This magical ring grants the wearer powers of detailed insight into damage dealt and recived during combat
on_equip_text: The magicks of the ring fills your body and strengthens your mind with new powers!
You gain detailed insigth into damage dealt and recived during combat!
text: It is made of a green mineral and decorated with pearls. The craftmanship is of remarkable quality.

5.name: ragged shirt
text: It is torn in multiple places and full of holes.

6.name: worn out pants
text: These pants are torn and damaged.

7.name: worn out shoes
text: These shoes are in a very bad condition.

8.name: rusty helmet
text: It is badly damaged, covered in rust and dents.

9.name: rusty shield
text: It is worn out by battle and by age. It is covered in rust and and has several holes.

10.name: rusty gauntlets
text: Not in a very good conition. The gauntlets are detroyed by rust and doesn't function very well.
